title: token_transfers
description: JSON schema for BigQuery table token_transfers

value.description: Amount of tokens transferred (ERC20) / id of the token transferred (ERC721). Use safe_cast for casting to NUMERIC or FLOAT64

log_index.description: Log index in the transaction receipt

block_timestamp.description: Timestamp of the block where this transfer was in

block_number.description: Block number where this transfer was in

block_hash.description: Hash of the block where this transfer was in
